name: She and the Light Bearer
description: She and the Light Bearer is a point and click adventure game, a poem, a fairy tale. Take a journey inside a vibrantly colored forest, meet silly creatures, listen to serene folk music, and discover somber secrets.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 or newer 处理器: 2.4 GHz or faster processor 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX 版本: 9.0 存储空间: 需要 600 MB 可用空间
